testcase.classname: F01_Home | user go to home page to show what about Swipy
testcase.name: user going to home
testcase.system-out: When User open the Swipy homepage and getting the page URl to confirm.......passed Then User show what about Swipy introduction sentence.......................passed When User hover and click on our features...................................passed Then User show all Swipy features...........................................passed When User hover and click on For Corporations and subscribe.................passed Then Will navigate to Swipy web app "https://dashboard.swipy.pro/auth"......passed When User hover and click on For Individuals and download the app...........passed And User click on download for IOS to download Swipy........................passed Then user navigate to ios page "https://apps.apple.com/us/app/swipy-business-card/id6456405197" and opened in new tab.passed When User click on download for Android to download Swipy...................passed Then user navigate to android page "https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.swipy.swipy" and opened in new tab.passed When user hover and click our clients button................................passed Then Show our clients list..................................................passed When user hover and click about Us button...................................passed When user hover and click get in touch button...............................passed And User enter his data and click send button...............................passed Then User click on send button to send his data.............................passed When user hover and click on Get Started button to create corporate.........passed

testcase.classname: F01_Home | user go to home page to show what about Swipy
testcase.name: user opens whatsapp link
testcase.system-out: When user hover and click our contact us button.............................passed And user click on whatsapp icon.............................................passed Then user navigate to whatsapp page "https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=+201091808186" and opened in new tab.passed

testcase.classname: F01_Home | user go to home page to show what about Swipy
testcase.name: user opens facebook link
testcase.system-out: When user hover and click our contact us button.............................passed And user click on facebook icon.............................................passed Then user navigate to facebook page "https://www.facebook.com/people/Swipy/61550753597813/" and opened in new tab.passed
